title: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka, Vuhledar of Donetsk region. Russia...
content: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka, Vuhledar of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Novomykhaylivka and Vodyane of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
